name: IGT Slots Miss Red
description:
Enjoy an all new set of actual casino slots from the world’s leading slot machine manufacturer, IGT®!

Get more of IGT’s most popular casino slot machines, including an all new set of 3– and 5–reel spinners, including Winning Colors!® Red White & Blue®, Win Zeros!® Blue Blazes®, Boingy Beans!® Bean to Be Wild®, Wild Red Sevens®, Blackbeard's Doubloons™, and Diamond Jubilee®; plus enjoy great 5–reel video machines, including Miss Red™, Cougarlicious®, Whale Song®, Wolf Run 2 Into the Wild®, 100 Ladies®, Crazy Chameleon®, Frantic Antics®, Bonus Bubbles®, and Billy Goat Bucks®!

Play the new Career Mode to track your stats and earn achievements as you make your way through the 3D casino! Or simply enter Freeplay Mode to play any machine any way you want — get the realistic Vegas experience with True Casino Payouts, or live the Vegas fantasy and experience more jackpots and bonus rounds with Extra High Payouts!

All machines offer fun bonus features like stacked wilds, End2End Expanding Wilds, progressive jackpots, free games, and there’s even a Reel MultiPLAY machine! All machines come in a variety of different denominations, from $0.01 all the way up to $100! You can play single–line or multi–line wagers: up to 100–line wagers! Or play machines with MultiWay wagering, and multi–line+MultiWay wagering combinations!
